TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class TrackBar Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize
type TrackBar = class inherit Control interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: Represents a standard Windows track bar.

span.span: Represents a standard Windows track bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个可滚动控件类似于控件。The is a scrollable control similar to the control. 你可以配置通过该范围的值通过设置属性的跟踪条的滚动属性来指定范围的下限和属性指定上限的范围。You can configure ranges through which the value of the property of a track bar scrolls by setting the property to specify the lower end of the range and the property to specify the upper end of the range. 属性定义添加或从中减去的增量单击鼠标时滚动框的任何一侧的属性。The property defines the increment to add or subtract from the property when clicks occur on either side of the scroll box. 可以显示跟踪条，水平或垂直。The track bar can be displayed horizontally or vertically. 你可以使用此控件输入数值数据通过获得属性。You can use this control to input numeric data obtained through the property. 你可以在控件中显示此数值数据或在代码中使用。You can display this numeric data in a control or use it in code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含控件和控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新为属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是使用默认水平方向和 0 到 10 范围与刻度线显示为每个值。The is created with a default horizontal orientation and a range of 0 to 10, with a tick mark shown for every value.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.

value.span: 如果是否自动调整跟踪条;否则为。

span.span: if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置属性`true`从而导致出现跟踪条 （如果水平对齐） 调整其高度或宽度 （如果垂直对齐）。You can set the property to `true` to cause the track bar to adjust its height (if horizontally aligned) or width (if vertically aligned). 高度或宽度将会调整为基于其显示跟踪条的屏幕分辨率的标准大小。The height or width is adjusted to a standard size based on the screen resolution on which the track bar is displayed. 设置属性`false`如果你想要自行调整大小。Set the property to `false` if you want to adjust the size yourself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TrackBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TrackBar1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 键或单击跟踪条的滚动框中，任何一侧根据中设置的值的属性更改属性。When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 你可以考虑设置的百分比值（对于垂直方向的跟踪条） 或（对于水平方向的跟踪条） 值。You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) value. 这将保持跟踪条移动的距离其大小成比例。This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体包含控件和控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新为属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the track bar.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the track bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，滚动块所移动从左到右作为会增加。When the property is set to , the scroll box moves from left to right as the increases. 当属性设置为，滚动框会移从底部到顶部作为会增加。When the property is set to , the scroll box moves from bottom to top as the increases. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置某些属性。The following example demonstrates how to set some of the properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按下的一个箭头键，根据中设置的值的属性更改属性。When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 你可能考虑的值设置为的值的百分比（对于垂直方向的跟踪条） 或（对于水平方向的跟踪条） 属性。You might consider setting the value of to a percentage of the value of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) property. 此设置使跟踪条移动的距离其大小成比例。This sets the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个包含窗体控件和控件。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新为属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.

value.span: 表示刻度之间的增量的数值。

span.span: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关范围较大的值之间和属性，它可能不切实际在控件上绘制所有值的刻度。For a with a large range of values between the and the properties, it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control. 例如，如果你有具有 100 的范围的控件，向其中传入 5 此处的值将导致控件绘制 20 个刻度。For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of 5 here causes the control to draw 20 ticks. 在这种情况下，每个计时周期表示的值的范围中的五个单位。In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个包含窗体控件和控件。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性以及如何处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新为属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此事件中跟踪栏更改表示的值时，更新其他控件。You can use this event to update other controls when the value represented in the track bar changes. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和成员以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体控件名称`TrackBar1`和控件名为`TextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control name `TrackBar1` and a control named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeTrackBar`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeTrackBar` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method.
